content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'trusted_sagestaoloja_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [trusted_sagestaoloja_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://trusted@sagestaoloja.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE contasapagar (
	[ID] int,
	[CODIGO] int,
	[SUBCODIGO1] int,
	[SUBCODIGO2] int,
	[DESCSUBCODIGO] nvarchar(4000),
	[CATEGORIA] nvarchar(4000),
	[DESCRICAO] nvarchar(4000),
	[DIAVENCTO] int,
	[MESVENCTO] int,
	[ANOVENCTO] int,
	[DIA_PG] int,
	[MES_PG] int,
	[ANO_PG] int,
	[VALOR] numeric(12,2),
	[VALORPG] numeric(12,2),
	[STATUS] nvarchar(4000),
	[PARCELAS] nvarchar(4000),
	[FORNECEDOR] nvarchar(4000),
	[UNIDADE] nvarchar(4000),
	[DATAINGESTAO] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'contasapagar/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [trusted_sagestaoloja_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.contasapagar
GO
